system.description:
knight

Destiny Playbook

You were once the squire, the tag-a-long. You were nobody. But now? Now you are somebody, and nobody can deny your worth. They cannot succeed without you anymore.

Requirements

To become the Knight, you must have 3 or more Bonds with at least two other players.

The Knight starts with You Have My Shield.

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.the-knight.Item.uXqvVGMk8IZajwJQ]{You have my shield}

Advancement

When you Level Up, choose one Advancement from either this list or from your Basic Playbook, then mark it. You may only choose each option once.

  • Take the Squire's Core Moves (Fast Friends, It's Dangerous To Go Alone, and Please, Just Listen). If you already have them, instead increase one of your stats by +1, to a maximum of +3.
  • Take a Squire Custom.
  • Take a Knight Custom.
  • Take a Knight Custom.
  • Take a Knight Custom.
